Translations.Text: Ni$, i kunwi, Amazan n Oebbi d amedya amxallef i win ippaooun Oebbi, akked was aneggaru, id ismektayen aias Oebbi
Mi walan lmumnin ikabaren, nnan: "ayagi d ayen i $ d Iwaaaed Oebbi, akked Umazan iS. Oebbi, akked Umazan iS, Ssawlen tidep". Ay sen irna kan, siwa liman akked wannuz
Ger lmumnin, llan irgazen i iiifen deg wayen i$ef auhden Oebbi. Garasen, wid ieellen timeooiwt nnsen, garasen wid ipganin. Ur bedlen mavi
Iwakken ad Ikafi Oebbi imawlan n tidep, $ef tidep nnsen, u ad Iaaqeb ixabiten, ma ihwa yaS, ne$ ad asen Issuref. Ih, Oebbi Izga Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Ieeaa Oebbi wid ijehlen, s ieeccio nnsen. Ur ppaddamen lxio. Issuli Oebbi ioad i lmumnin. Oebbi Izga d Uohid, d Uzmir
Issers ed, si lebouj nnsen, wid i sen ifkan afus, seg wAt Tezmamt. Issekcem tugdi deg ulawen nnsen. Arbaa ten$am ten, arbaa teebsem ten
Irra kwen tweotem akal nnsen, ixxamen nnsen, ayla nnsen. D akal ur taafisem. Ih, Oebbi Izmer i yal cci
